name: not gate - multiple toggles
command:
echo -e "in = 0
simulate
in = 1
simulate
in = 0
simulate
display" | @BIN @DATA/nts_single/not.nts
result:
> > > > > > > tick: 3
input(s):
  in: 0
output(s):
  out: 1
>

name: xor gate - alternating pattern
command:
echo -e "in_1 = 0
in_2 = 1
simulate
in_1 = 1
in_2 = 0
simulate
display" | @BIN @DATA/nts_single/xor.nts
result:
> > > > > > > tick: 2
input(s):
  in_1: 1
  in_2: 0
output(s):
  out: 1
>
